channel.title: 317 loading 562 ground textures?!
channel.description: I'm working on making my 317 load 562 ground textures. It already loads 525 char models. Wish me luck? I got my hands on some 508 brick models. I can't find most stuff though. I'm not sure if its even possible but I want to make an HD 317 client

item.title: 317 loading 562 ground textures?!
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

you have 525 char models, and?

having character models has nothing to do with ground textures, for one youd have to rewrite additions to the ground texturing system, and 2 you would need to dump the 508 flo.dat, which nobody has been able to do 100% yet. the closest person to do this is pb600 for my knowledge

Read full topic

item.title: 317 loading 562 ground textures?!
item.dc:creator: @mrcrispypwn mrcrispypwn
item.description:
@mrcrispypwn wrote:

I asked for help but no1 helped me. I am working on my own bro. I got the 508 brick texture for the lumby castle don’t but I’m having a hard time sorting through caches. I’m looking through 508s, 525s, and 562s… cache editors don’t open them correctly lol

Read full topic

item.title: 317 loading 562 ground textures?!
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

He asked help for this on client section.

So goodluck with following a tutorial?

If you do this alone, then I wish you good luck.
But you should explain more. What we know now is ‘562 ground textures on 317’ and so what? There are MORE areas you know. etc etc

Read full topic
